witw.name: Where in the World?
witw.description: The Where in the World? project is a dynamic web application that presents comprehensive data on all countries in the world, based on the REST Countries API. Developed with a focus on usability and visual experience, the system allows users to explore countries through an intelligent search, which can be combined with filters by continent. When clicking on a country, a dedicated page displays details such as flag, population, language, currency, subregion, domains, and neighboring countries, also allowing for fluid navigation between them. The interface supports a dark theme and animations that enhance interaction, keeping the project lightweight and responsive across devices.
